sn35.140:1.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn35.140:1.3: Aniccasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto niccaṁ bhavissati …pe…
sn35.140:1.5: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhāya uppādāya sopi anicco.
sn35.140:1.6: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, jivhā kuto niccā bhavissati …pe…
sn35.140:1.8: Yopi, bhikkhave, hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn35.140:1.9: Aniccasambhūto, bhikkhave, mano kuto nicco bhavissati.
sn35.140:1.10: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… jivhāyapi nibbindati …pe… manasmimpi nibbindati,
sn35.140:1.11: nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn35.140:1.12: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
